metadata.description: Context Engineering skills for building production-grade AI agent systems

plugins.name: context-engineering-fundamentals
plugins.description: Core context engineering skills covering fundamentals, degradation patterns, compression strategies, and optimization techniques for AI agent systems

plugins.name: agent-architecture
plugins.description: Multi-agent patterns, memory systems, tool design, filesystem-based context, and hosted agent infrastructure for building production AI agent architectures

plugins.name: agent-evaluation
plugins.description: Evaluation frameworks and LLM-as-judge techniques for testing and validating AI agent systems

plugins.name: agent-development
plugins.description: Project development methodology for LLM-powered applications including pipeline architecture and batch processing

plugins.name: cognitive-architecture
plugins.description: BDI mental state modeling and cognitive architecture patterns for building rational agents with formal belief-desire-intention representations
